title: InterGlobe Hotels to invest about Rs 550 cr on two new properties by 2025
description: InterGlobe Hotels, a joint venture between InterGlobe Enterprises and Accor Asia Pacific, plans to invest approximately Rs 550 crore to open two new properties in Mumbai and Bengaluru by 2025. The company recently launched an 'ibis Styles' hotel in Vagator and aims to open an 'ibis' brand hotel in Mumbai by the end of next year, followed by a Novotel brand hotel in Bengaluru in early 2025.
